feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 2:11 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: N 20 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
